textBeforeTable: Please use the chart below to convert between standard size formats Size Conversion Chart Browse and buy 2nd Day clothing online today... The 2nd Day women's capsule range brings youthful attitude to the mainlines minimalist style. The neutral palettes and soft feminine fabrics are complimented by the alluring drapings which add an understated elegance to the overall 2nd Day womenswear collections. 2nd Day clothing offers easy-to-wear pieces spanning sweaters, denim jeans, printed t-shirts and tailored or leather jackets and each piece offers daytime chic to evening simplicity and glamour. Danish brand DAY Birger et Mikkelsen was founded in 1997 by designer Keld Mikkelsen who, inspired by his world travels, created a collection which blends a distinct Scandinavian style with contemporary vintage-inspired glamour. DAY Birger et Mikkelsen focuses on fine tailoring, fabrics and detailed embellishment, whilst also being influenced by Asian prints, patterns, edgings and trimmings. The Day clothing is brought to life through creativity and individuality, appealing to the urban and bohemian by taking classics and reworking them to become their own distinctive style. The brand is growing rapidly and now with two Danish flagship stores and points of sale in more than a thousand stores in 5 countries, DAY Birger et Mikkelsen is becoming a must have in the wardrobes of the style conscious globally.
